Text.Page:
I need you to help secure the area around Lookout Point.

To that end, kill {@LinkCreature:45#3001#argonomorph Lokian archers} and {@LinkCreature:45#3002#reavers}, as well as {@LinkCreature:45#3003#kelba rippers} and {@LinkCreature:45#3004#athakela stalkers}.

Report to {@Creature:245#1004$$Beruse} at Field Base Valiance when your mission is complete.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
